system.description:
This small silver charm resembles a feather. Many types of feather tokens exist with different effects.

You can use an action to toss the token to a point that you can see within 10 feet. The token transforms into a floating whip that you can command by using a bonus action, making it move up to 20 feet and attack a creature up to 10 feet away from it. The whip has an attack bonus of +10 and deals 1d6+6 force damage.

The whip vanishes after 1 hour, when you die, or when you use an action to dismiss it.
